title: New: IYES – ‘Til Infinity
body:
**IYES** have been destined for the big-time since their two demo tracks appeared online at the beginning of they ear, and with _‘Til Infinity_, their debut single proper, the duo show everyone why they’ve been so quiet over the past few months.

With early reviews drawing comparisons to The XX, this new track is far more out and out pop than anything they’ve done previously, and in truth, **IYES** have never sounded better. Check out _‘Til Infinity_ below.
